testcase.classname: As A user I want to send message and navigate to social media pages
testcase.name: Send a message without checking the "I Agree" checkbox and receive an error
testcase.system-out: Given Home page is open.....................................................passed Given The modal is closed...................................................passed And I click on the "Contacts" button........................................passed And I "ScroolDown" the page.................................................passed And I fill in "Full_Name" field with "nameTest" value.......................passed And I fill in "Email" field with "email@test.com" value.....................passed And I fill in "Phone" field with "123456789" value..........................passed And I fill in "Company" field with "testCompany" value......................passed And I fill in "Description" field with "testingtestingtestingtesting" value.passed And I click on the "Send_Message" button....................................passed Then I should see the checking error "Please check and accept our Privacy Policy".passed
